page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.......
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD 8 YRS. I get up at 8.a.m. get dressed and have cornflakes for breakfast. I walk to school with my friends. School begins at 9.a.m. with an assembly, and then we have lessons. During playtime we play games like British Bulldog. after lunch we paint or make plasticine models. The teacher reads us a story and then it is time to go home. After tea I play with my friend Claire. We play hide and seek and tiggy. Afterwards I watch television. My favourite programme is A. Team. I have my supper and go to bed at 9 p.m.
